website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for a high-tech headphone stand to accessorize their desk space should check out this durable option.
pros: Made of strong aluminum for a sturdy build, this product also features 3 USB ports, auxiliary plug-in, and a back hook to hang extra cables
Constructed with a no-slip grip with a universal headphone fit
cons: More expensive than other headphone stands
USB ports do not allow quick charge for smartphones

customer_reviews.title: Functional and nice to look at
customer_reviews.text: Great way to store and charge my Bose headphones. Gave 4 stars because it isn't powerful enough to charge them and my phone at the same time, but seeing as the main purpose I bought it for was to charge my headphones I'm very pleased with it. It seems sturdy, has good weight to the base and snaps together so super easy to assemble. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a nice way to charge and store their headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Giovanelli

customer_reviews.title: Shallow headphone jack and doesn't work well for charging
customer_reviews.text: needed a new hub to replace my Sabrent 4-Port this is a good replacement, it has some issues charging phones but typically I plug my devices to charge directly into my laptop or computer was only testing them with the stand. my main thing is the headphone plug is a little too shallow so headphones don't go all the way in, some headphones give a low static noise because of this. It does fulfill my needs i can hand my headphones on it and use both my external drives so I am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Mcphee

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but the charging ports don’t work
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but the charging ports don’t work. I called customer service and they said it needs to be plugged into my computer. Currently I don’t have or need a computer. I wanted to use this as a charging station for my iphone, iPad, I watch and beats. It looks good and matches all my stuff. To bad I can’t use it as intended. Customer service said they would send me an email with possible solutions but I haven’t received anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More useful than I thought...
customer_reviews.text: Always struggled with where to put my gaming headphones when I'm done with a session so I searched for a headphone hanger. Found Satechi and what is this? Headphone jack, 3 x USB 3.0 hub and cable hooks, what a shortcut! Thought these "headphone hangers" where just a 'nice to have accessory' but it actually turned out to be a lot of convenience. Totally recommend! ...but just a little OCD twitch for me was the rubber padding on the top where the headphone rests on is a little off center, but it's fine and does what it has to well.
customer_reviews.author: Ghassan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stand and 3.0 USB Hub
customer_reviews.text: Amazing build quality and simple installation. No extra drivers were needed on my Windows 10 machine. Knocked off one star as audio from the headphone jack on the stand did compress audio slightly compared to directly connected to my PC. Settings were exactly the same on both. Not a huge issue but maybe something that can be improved on for later models. Also, why no black or gunmetal color? Silver is nice as it matches my headphones but a black color would match my home decor better.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and useful
customer_reviews.text: Good for those who are going for a clean desk appearance. I've personally tried out the headphone holders that just stick to a surface anywhere on your desk and can just slide in... Not really for me and the adhesive eventually wears down. This solves all those problems for me and gives me some USB ports to plug in those wireless devices or devices I want off to the side. I don't recommend it to charge much else than your wireless or Bluetooth ear buds, but works fine for what I was hoping to use it for. Thanks for making this product!
customer_reviews.author: William Burns

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. This is a gorgeous headphone stand/USB 3.0 hub combination. It's fairly heavy. Great quality. Currently I'm hanging my Sony Gold headset on it. I also think the cord wrap section on the back was well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: vicky monge

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these items for myself and a friend- the unit doesn’t charge (hardly) for either of us. Good idea though, I’d it would only work as intended. Too expensive to be a failure. Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Goldie Silverheels

customer_reviews.title: Extremely usef
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this headphone stand. Quality metal build, and a useful little USB hub. I actually use it as a hub to not only charge my bluetooth headphones, but also my external battery. Zero complaints. This is an all-around perfect headphone stand and USB hub. I actually bought this little set of cable to use for charging on the stand. It's perfect for keeping things consolidated and not having a mess of cords around your desk.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy and looks premium. The only issue I have is the USB ports are not aligned to the aluminum body properly (at least not on my stand). The 2nd and 3rd USB ports are difficult to use as I would need to insert USB cable at an angle then force the port to the left to use. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MnM

customer_reviews.title: which at face value would seem like a rip-off
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is a $30+ headphone stand, which at face value would seem like a rip-off. It's not. The inclusion of the three USB 3.0 ports sells itself. The fact that it is made of sturdy materials with a sleek and elegant design is just secondary. Really though, my only complaint would be that, for me, the USB cord to connect the stand to my PC was a bit too short for my setup. So factor in the cost of buying either an extension cord or another, much longer cord to the total cost of this product if your stand is going to be on the opposite side of your desk from your PC.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not a charging device
customer_reviews.text: It’s very slim, like that. Misleading though, description says you can plug headphones in, which lead me to believe they could be charged while hanging on the unit, not so. Disappointing. So now I’ll have to connect another cable to plug them into...
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Great great great !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great finished alumini headphone stand, you can feel and see the quality of the product. Hags my ATH m50x great and has a holder in the back for your cable which keeps the stand and your headphones looking very clean and professional. It also has usb 3.0 ports which are great to have and make my life way easier. And lastly has a six port so you can just plug your headphones in to the stand instead of in the computer directly which once again makes it easier and cleaner to do.
customer_reviews.author: Rivan

customer_reviews.title: Good esthetics
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Looks great on the desk. If only kids would put their head phone on the stand instead of all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Ped2th

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy base
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy it is and how many extra ports it has. I don't know if this applies to all wireless headphones but I can't have the base plugged into my pc while I'm using my wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: LA Foster

customer_reviews.title: Best heaphone stand there is.
customer_reviews.text: This headphone stand is great! First, it looks nice, second it has three high speed USB ports which adds wonderful amounts of convenience. The back side has two prongs so you can wrap your headphone wires around for a nice neat look if you want. I do wish there was a quick release on one of those prongs (similar to the way vacuums do it) but it is a minor gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset Stand
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and looking stand, with extra functionality. It can charge up to three devices at once and do more. I have one suggestion that would make this better, they need to cover the entire top area with that foam because the edges are so sharp and its made out of metal, it can easily scratch your headset if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel izrael

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of the charging ports on this stand. I was looking for something similar for my gaming headset when this popped up. I cannot attest to how wiring your earphones through the stand is, my set is wireless, but the feel of the stand is sturdy, and the power ports are so convenient for charging my phone, headset, wireless mouse, etc.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product a couple weeks ago and so far everything works as expected. I love the fact that is double as USB 3 hub for my setup. I actually thought this would be a little darker since I purchased the space gray version to match my black setup, but they were not and I hope the company will make a black finish version in the future. I was a little annoyed that the cost on the manufacturer website was less than what they were listed for on Amazon and being sold by the same company. However, overall I would still recommend the product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy997

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphone Stand
customer_reviews.text: Love this headphone stand. The USB hub works great. My headphones are wireless and need to be charged. I have a very short USB chord plugged into one of the ports and it charges them right up. Better stand than many for less money.
customer_reviews.author: rkovars

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and matches perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love the rose gold color matches perfectly with my Rose gold headphones (Beats solo 2.0 in rose gold. Haven’t tested it out but it seems very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: jocelin miranda

customer_reviews.title: Basic, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed. Easy assembly, charges even when my PC is off (yay), and has enough room for both of my headphones (one wired for the PC, one wireless for my cell phone). I do wish the ports were more towards the sides or the back, but it does the job. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Loux

customer_reviews.title: Great looking stand.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this nice looking headphone stand on gray space and it looks great next to my 4K LG 27UK850 monitor. I like that it has three 3.0 USB ports, but not meant for powering or charging other devices only file transfers. Other than that I'll give it a 4 star. I just wished it powered and allows you to charge other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Noe Bear

customer_reviews.title: It can charge devices
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews about this headset holder and that it would have trouble charging an iPhone 6s. I have had no such problem, just be sure you are plugging it into a USB 3.0 root hub. Headset charges at the same time as well.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN

customer_reviews.title: The color looks really nice and the stand stays sturdy with the logitech g933 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife because it's pink. The color looks really nice and the stand stays sturdy with the logitech g933 headset. I knocked off a star because it's ridiculous that this only came with a 3ft usb 3.0 cable. I mean that is just stupid as it's way too short. At least come with a 6 foot one especially at 30 plus dollars.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stand, Doesn't Work as a Charging Station.
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for a few months, the USB ports don't work. One of three didn't charge right of the box and now none of them work, which ultimately defeats the purpose of buying this stand over cheaper options that don't offer USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: Gokart Mozart

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good purchase but be careful
customer_reviews.text: Matches my silver grey QC35 perfectly. However the instruction manual is useless. At first I did not notice the usb port at the back, which is the one that's supposed to connect to your computer. Also becareful with the audio. You have to go to your settings to select your computer as defult audio output, otherwise the audio is connected to the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hate wires showing so I wanted something that looked nice ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a stand to put my headphones for my PlayStation in my mancave. I hate wires showing so I wanted something that looked nice without a mess of cables. This worked perfectly. It has a bracket on the back to wrap cords around so you don't have a mess wherever you put this. My only complaint is the charging cord it comes with is pretty short so you can move this far from a power supply. But I solved that witha USB extended cable and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Posejpal

customer_reviews.title: good headphones stand, bad USB hub.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and well built headphones stand, bad USB hub. The ports are really only useful for powering low voltage devices such as LED strips or input devices such as a wireless keyboard/mouse receiver when attached to a computer. It is worthless for file transfers via USB 3.0... no matter what the media, every file transfer results in data corruption.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M. Strand

customer_reviews.title: Gamer husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my husband and he uses it daily. The ports in the base are so convenient, and it looks nice on your desk too.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea R.

customer_reviews.title: USB Ports NEVER last on these things...
customer_reviews.text: So the charging port STOPPED charging on one of the slots and I am past my return date. This isn't right!
customer_reviews.author: Ryanielle

customer_reviews.title: This headphone stand works great (while it works)
customer_reviews.text: This headphone stand works great (while it works)...but it started getting glitchy on me just after the 1 year warranty ended. Now the audio to my headphones only comes through the left ear unless the 3.5mm cable is in the perfect position, so it cuts out quite a bit(I checked with several different pairs of headphones, so it is definitely the stand). Not sure if this is just mine or it happens to others, but it's hard to recommend if it will always break down right after the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Drtomtron

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset Holder / USB Hub.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product. Easy "installation" (Just press the two pieces together). Works great as a USB hub. If I had one complaint it's that the Blue LED stays on, even when the PC it's attached to is off. It's a bit too bright for my liking, but other than that minor issue it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Basch

customer_reviews.title: Great Look, poor USBs
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but the USB ports stopped working after a few weeks. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: They say it's NEW. Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: My product which I bought new came opened and might have been used. False advertisement
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Silver is the new Black
customer_reviews.text: The finish on the headphone stand matches the finish on my PC, DVD Player, and External hard drive. Te functionality increases with the extra USB ports and storage for a headphone ard wire. Matches my Bose Quiet Comfort II headphones in silver. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Read my review BEFORE buying ! :)
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with scuff marks and scratches. Also no USB port cord or any kind of cord was provided. They put a barcode sticker on it which leaves behind a horrible residue and is terrible to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Austyn Bass

customer_reviews.title: Great for showcasing nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: This looks and feels great. Very sturdy, doesnt woble. Has a grip pad that helps prevent your headphones from moving. Looks great. It does take up space. However i bought it for the purpose of also showcasing my nice headsets so i do not have a problem with it taking up space.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and is as described by seller.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you can charge your headphones and have them hanging nearby without cluttering space by laying the headphones on the desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne VanGundy

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed at the quality and love the UBS charge ports that work perfect on my desk at work with my other accessories. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Martin L. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Desk Utility, Worthwhile Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Clean design that matches similar products by Satechi and makes the desk space look clean and crisp. The USB 3.0 addition helps reduce cables running direct to the desktop and allows me to charge my headphones with a short (6") micro-USB cable versus a longer one. I store my Samsung Gear Circle and my PS Gold head set on the stand and have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: REM

customer_reviews.title: Great looks but USB don't work.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, USBs are great ideas, but they don't work. I had it for maybe 2 months and the USB slots don't hold power anymore. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: they work good
customer_reviews.text: good sound and has a fair distance on them for walking around the house
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: This headphone holder has no paddinng on the arm where ...
customer_reviews.text: This headphone holder has no paddinng on the arm where the headphone hangs on to. My headphone has a soft cushion under the band. If it hangs on the holder too long, the cushion will get indented.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Does what it does well.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should well. Easily hang headphones, charge said headphones or other USB devices. Looks very good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo J. Nogueras

customer_reviews.title: Might kill your USB controller
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically nice and long enough to fit big headphones. The USB ports stopped working. Got a windows error that the USB port connected to it was drawing too much power. I checked it with a USB power monitor and it was drawing 3 amps at 4.5V!! Smelled burned too, something is definitely shorted inside. If you value your motherboard don't plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: xxxxxxxxxxx

customer_reviews.title: this dot is a dope~! I have using it ...
customer_reviews.text: this dot is a dope~! I have using it for a few months and it's usb 3.0 are very fast. I have my beats studio on it. Sometimes, when my battery ran out, I can just use the usb 3.0 as a charger for my headphone ! This is supper convenience. If you are thinking about having one of this, I can tell you" just go for it".
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: It has held up great. Would recommend to any gamer
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husband and he loves it. We’ve had it almost a year now and he still uses it every day. It has held up great. Would recommend to any gamer!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, I use it for my astro A20s, also have a USB hooked up for my scuf controllers and my Astro A50s. Works so well I might buy 2.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love it, Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great on my desk, Love the shipping time as well. I was told its not really for charging but it does a great job charging my Head phones. Price is seep but the USB 3.0 I had to buy it. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: The question is whether he will like it. He seemed to like it on the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift I bought to give my son. The question is whether he will like it. He seemed to like it on the day he got it, but that's not surprising since he himself put it on his Christmas gift list.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Practical solution to a common issue.
customer_reviews.text: A reliable product that fully meets my needs. Easily installed and good value for money. I like it because it brings my headphones and their controls to my desktop, away from my computer that sits under my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Havamal

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good/affordable headphone stand, with fairly useful USB 3.0 ports that I use as a charging station. The 1/8" headphone jack seemed a little tight for headphones, but I don't use it anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: I have tb px4 & xp510's. The 510's came with a stand but not the px4's. I was always having to charge them in spot that was inconvenient for me, not now. I can charge both at the same time from the base of this, pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: The grey bush

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice on a desk
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice on a desk. However those using it for its audio pass through you may be disappointed as it creates a usb audio device. Couldn't use it with my amp/dac but the usb ports are still useful.
customer_reviews.author: Texanman

customer_reviews.title: Great for a clean desk
customer_reviews.text: Perfect desktop addition. Tidied up my long headphone cable and gives me easy way to plug USB into my computer.
customer_reviews.author: StrifeWolfe

customer_reviews.title: Wish the USB ports worked to charge my PS4 Move Controller.
customer_reviews.text: I would of gave this headphone stand a higher rating if the 3 USB ports on the base charged my PS4 move controllers. It is weird. I plugged my phone into one of the ports and it charges. I plugged my PS4 move controller and my PS4 wireless headphones into the port and nothing. I don't know why, but that is one of the reasons I purchased this item. A little disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremey Z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Multi USB Ports
customer_reviews.text: Elegant finish, easy installation Has multiple USB ports for all the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Zurdita

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Well made
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Well made, has a charging usb and other connectors, it is also the perfect size without being the center of attention of the room.
customer_reviews.author: T. F.

customer_reviews.title: keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.text: I order a fair amount of items off Amazon, and this is the first review I’ve wrote because honestly, I felt compelled to do so. First thing I need to comment on, was how expedient the headphone stand was delivered. Within 24 hours of ordering, the product arrived on my doorstep when the expected arrival date was two days out. As for the price, the quality is exquisite; I would have never expected the quality and functionality to coincide. This product by far exceeds any expectations I could have ever imagined. Satechi, keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very nice looking, helps to keep my desk clean and perfect for working. Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Davide

customer_reviews.title: Good material, good finish
customer_reviews.text: Good material, good finish. But as a 40 dollar product of this kind, the packaging can be improved like using hard material. One more thing is that once I plug in the USB, the 3.5mm output built on my computer no longer works. Only the one on this product is in condition. It sometimes could be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Tang

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.text: The pass-through audio seems to cause the audio on my computer to stutter if i'm at load (gaming and recording at the same time), but otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dalibor Zujovic

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to the desktop. Looks sleek and keeps headphones and cables neatly placed while unused and/or charging.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Preblud

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: This stand is worth every cent. It is extreamly useful and space saving. The built in usb hub and audio out is also a great feature. I highly recomend this item.
customer_reviews.author: alan hjertstedt

customer_reviews.title: USB ports do not work
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials, looks very good but the 3 USB ports on the one I received do not work, will not charge phone/tablet, I’ve tried a few different cables and the blue led light on the stand is on so it is getting power from my outlet but no out putting power from the USB ports
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Almost Apple Product Worthy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. They work great for a USB hub as well as the headphones. I very much like that all of the devices run through one USB cable. It's extremely professional looking and looks very similar to my MacBook. Almost apple product worthy.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Visser

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stand. Bought for my wife and she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stand. Bought for my wife and she loves it. Herlook great hanging on them.
customer_reviews.author: R og

customer_reviews.title: It works great! He can have his headphones hanging by his ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son. It works great! He can have his headphones hanging by his computer and then use them as needed. The USB hub is a grate feature.
customer_reviews.author: letti001

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone who does PC gaming on the daily
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift - dude uses it every day and says he didn't realize how badly he needed one until he had it. Great for anyone who does PC gaming on the daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: It holds headphones nicely. But does NOT charge anything from the USB outlets even when connected to a computer. Which means you have to get another cord to charge --- would not have bought if I had known this.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Worth the extra for a premium product.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a day, but it's solid so far. Works out of the box, sturdy construction, attractive. I love the hub feature and even if you no longer need to use it as a headset stand, you can pull the arm and use it as a hub only. Comes with USB Standard-A to Standard-A to connect to the computer. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: A. Farren

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nice looking. USB ports are really convenient too.
customer_reviews.author: AwJeez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset stand.
customer_reviews.text: I'm always nervous about buying electronics from brands I've never heard of before, but this headset stand is excellent. It holds my headphones securely, and the USB 3.0 slots are just as fast as the ones attached to my computer. It also looks modern and blends in nicely on my desk. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This product does not charge and when I plugged my iwatch up to it. This device burnt out the battery. Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: Product is good, but the rubber grip on mine came partially ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, but the rubber grip on mine came partially torn off - and it can't be easily disassembled for return.
customer_reviews.author: AARON B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on a desk and the additional usb and aux ports are great. My aux port recently died on the front of my gaming machine and having it on a headphone stand is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, But Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This is quite an expensive headphone stand, but is well worth the money. If you're looking for something that's quality, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom K.

customer_reviews.title: Dead USBs
customer_reviews.text: I also was unlucky enough to get one with dead USB ports. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Color isn't perfect otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: Color doesn't match perfectly but otherwise it works great for beats Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great, what can I say? USB works, sound output works, looks great. Would be nice if it had a light pointing at the headphones but its fine as is.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good and is sturdy but any headset that is plugged into one of its ports shows as a different device per port
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Little

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Mac users need to switch output first time
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, but for Mac users you might need to go into your sound settings to switch output the first time to the USB device. After that, it will always recognize the output switch when you plug your headphones into the audio jack on the base. Great quality overall, I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: brian clark

customer_reviews.title: VERY happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy with this purchase. Nicely built and finished, USB and audio work as they should with no issues connecting or charging an iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: Cale A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: The best headstand! It's nice. Quality is amazing. Even has a cable holder in the back. I recommend this to anyone that's looks for a good solid headstand! 100% awesomeness!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Belmontes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Built quality is nice. Rather have this than a plastic one that catches a lot of dust overtime
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Dang

customer_reviews.title: gaming headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are my sons but he swears by them said they are the best headphones ever he uses them for his gaming PC
customer_reviews.author: KJG

customer_reviews.title: One of the best investments I have made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best investments I have made!! I have ruined many headsets because they get knocked off the desk or cables ripped out because of the clutter. USB hub is a very very nice feature. Fits my Astro A40s perfectly. Will be purchasing another for my son in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this is as a Christmas present for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is as a Christmas present for my boyfriend. He needed a place to hand his headphones to free up desk space and needed more USB ports. We had a little trouble getting the USB ports to work, his headphones and iPhone wouldn't charge when plugged in at first. He figured out how to get the ports to work, but I don't know how he did it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a little disappointed about that
customer_reviews.text: The base doesn't appear to be entirely aluminium, a little disappointed about that. There is also a blue power indicator which gets annoying seeing as my PC continues to supply power when shut down. Otherwise the stand is a very good quality and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The stand itself is very sturdy and holds headphones
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the built-in audio device or USB hub. The stand itself is very sturdy and holds headphones. It looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: cypher

customer_reviews.title: Art that holds your headphones
customer_reviews.text: This stand is beautiful. All my ports and chargers have worked flawlessly with continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S

customer_reviews.title: the usb hub is a bonus and might come useful in the
customer_reviews.text: strong and solid, can hold up my razor kraken no problem and its not a light pair of headphones, the usb hub is a bonus and might come useful in the future
customer_reviews.author: nick t

customer_reviews.title: Nice Option
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he loves it. It is by his side of the bed and used every night.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and useful headphone stand!
customer_reviews.text: A very sleek headphone stand that offers more than just that. Not only does it do its job perfect but provide a USB 3.0 hub for more devices and a 3.5mm headphone jack for your headphones. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a sleek aluminum headphone stand.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick De Alba

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fits my needs exactly. Props up a full sized over-ear headset and powers a small USB fan as well as a phone charger.
customer_reviews.author: theKbru

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Kinda weird looking on my desk but can charge 3 electronics via USB. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tran

customer_reviews.title: And it's nice to have cord management but I never feel like ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have to do much. But the USB ports work. And it's nice to have cord management but I never feel like wrapping the cord up because it ends up being harder to quickly grab the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: ... a little less but for the most part im happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: i wouldve thought i could get this for a little less but for the most part im happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: was not anticipating how useful the extra USB ports would be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it appeared attractive and wasn't plastic. I, however, was not anticipating how useful the extra USB ports would be. I charge my Bluetooth speaker, use my headphones and charge my cellphone from this bad boy daily, and it looks just as attractive/sturdy in person as it does in the pic. Very please. :)
customer_reviews.author: LONG

product_meta.title: Satechi Aluminum USB Headphone Stand Holder with 3 USB 3.0 Ports & 3.5mm AUX Port - Universal Fit - Compatible with Satechi, Bose, Sony, Beats, JBL, Panasonic, AKG (V2, Space Gray)
product_meta.description:
Size:V2| Color:Space GrayThe Satechi Aluminum USB Headphone Stand is your modern solution to storing your favorite set of headphones. Featuring a sleek design and three USB-A ports, it is more than a home for your headset.

Everything Should Have Its Place
Here’s one for your headphones! Instead of letting your favorite headphones sit unceremoniously at your desk letting cables get tangled, the aluminum stand offers a simple and convenient place to store them.

All About Convenience 
Equipped with built-in USB-A data transfer ports and a 3.5mm audio jack port, to provide easy access to USB peripherals and directly connect your headphones. USB-A ports do not support charging or Apple SuperDrive.

Beautiful Design
The Aluminum USB Headphone Stand has a sleek, sophisticated design making it the perfect complement to any Apple computer or accessory. Available in a variety of modern colors.

Compatibility 
Fits all over-ear headphones including Bose, Sony, Beats, JBL, Panasonic, AKG, Audio-Technica, Sennheiser, Shure and more.

Please Note 
The USB ports on the stand function as a USB hub only, to connect USB 3.0, 2.0, USB 1.1 devices to your computer, and is not a standalone device charger. Headphones are not included. 

1 Year Manufacturer Warranty
feature_bullets: HEADPHONE STAND - conveniently store your headphones so they are always in reach! Features a small footprint to help de-clutter and organize your desk space
CONNECT USB DEVICES - includes three USB 3.0 ports to transfer files or back-up data, with speeds up to 5 Gbps. USB-A ports do not support charging or Apple SuperDrive
ORGANIZE YOUR CABLES - equipped with a backside hook to wrap and store cables when not in use
SECURE, RUBBERIZED GRIP - features a rubberized grip to securely hold your headphones in place while preventing any scratches
UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY - supports all over-ear headphones including Bose, Beats, Sony, Panasonic, AKG, JBL, Audio-Technica, Sennheiser, Shure and more
